name: Pacific Lutheran University
academic_year: September to May (September-December; January-May). Also Summer Session (June-August)
accrediting_agency: National Alumnae Association of Spelman College (NAASC), Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business (AACSB), National Council for Accreditation of Teacher Education (NCATE),  American Association for Marriage and Family Therapy (AAMFT), National Association of Schools of Music (NASM), American Chemical Society, National League for Nursing, Council on Social Work Education
